title: Brute Force of fabric-ca server admin account
content:
fabric-ca server
Default configuration maxenrollments value -1(enable outside enrollment)
Listening 0.0.0.0:7054(easily discoved and can be reached)
No limit to wrong password try Above conditions result in brute force to CA server admin account
Impact
Attack gain a high-level permissioned account to permissioned network and can add\delete\update\query
steps: Identify the fabric-ca server running on 0.0.0.0:7054
Attempt brute force attacks on the admin account due to no limit on wrong password tries
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows brute force attacks on the fabric-ca server admin account due to default configurations like maxenrollments set to -1 (enabling outside enrollment), no restrictions on password attempts, and the server being easily discoverable on 0.0.0.0:7054. This can lead to gaining high-level permissions in a permissioned network.
reason: The attack is straightforward, involving only the identification of the server and brute-forcing the admin password without any complex interactions or state manipulations.
